General.Name: Merida Minerals Inc.
General.Description: Hispania Resources Inc., an exploration and development company, engages in acquisition, exploration, and development of properties in Spain. The company focuses on exploring zinc, copper, lead, and silver deposits. It holds 100% interest in the Herrerias Property comprising 299 contiguous mining blocks covering an area of 90 square kilometers located in east-southeast of Badajoz, Spain. In addition, the company has 100% option to acquire in the Segoviana West Property; and the Lumbrales Property. Hispania Resources Inc. was formerly known as Merida Minerals Holdings Inc. and changed its name to Hispania Resources Inc. in December 2022. The company is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 15 Toronto Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5C 2E3
